metadata.name: Rundll32 Execution With Uncommon DLL Extension
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of rundll32 with a command line that doesn't contain a common extension

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND NOT (process.cmd_line is null OR lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('') OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl\'')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll\'')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf,')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf\''))) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.inf'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -localserver ')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\installer\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tmp')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zzzzinvokemanagedcustomactionoutofproc'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\microsoft\\edgeupdate\\install\\{')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\edgemitmp_')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('.tmp\\setup.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('--install-archive=')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('--previous-version=')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('--msedgewebview --verbose-logging --do-not-launch-msedge --user-level'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of rundll32 with a command line that doesn't contain a common extension
